author: markt
msg: Switch to destroySocket in a few places where it is safe to do so.

author: markt
msg: Refactor the method names some more.

author: markt
msg: Add a warning comment and simplify the code a little.

author: markt
msg: Refactor the remove list in the Poller to be a close list. The poller
now removes the socket if it is in the Poller then destroys it. Note the
socket is always destroyed whether it is found in the Poller or not.

author: prestonc
msg: Adding a benchmark directory to hold future XQuery benchmarks. The code for developing the first benchmark on weather data from NOAA is listed under resources. This is the first update to begin the finalization of this benchmark and providing the code to the public.
